name: Awards Season
description: If you deal at least 50% overkill damage to your opponent in a match, the next pack of cards you open will have at least 1 additional Legendary card and 1 additional Rare card.

hooks.OnBattleEnd: if (Battle.Winner == Player && Battle.OverkillDamage >= (Opponent.MaxHP * 0.50)) { Player.PendingRewards.Add("BonusLegendary"); Player.PendingRewards.Add("BonusRare"); Log("AWARDS SWEEP! Bonus Legendary and Rare cards incoming!"); }
